profile.name: Ricky
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Contributing to @facebook and Open-Source Projects
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and React Native. Proven track record of collaborating on open-source projects and addressing complex technical challenges.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple React Native applications, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Conducted code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Worked on open-source projects such as async-react and React Query.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including React Native and React.
Participated in discussions on GitHub and Facebook's React issues tracker.
